title: Remote for Toshiba TV
summary: Remote for Toshiba TV is a virtual remote control that lets you control your TV

description: "Remote for Toshiba TV" is a virtual remote control that lets you control your TV. The application is completely free.The application works on all Toshiba TVs. We use the infrared system of your smartphone so the detection of your TV will work automatically.In addition to a beautiful design of the remote control, you can use all the functionality of the real remote.Here is the list of features :- Increase / decrease the volume- Changing Channels- Use the navigation pad- Use the media player functions- Smart TV function , info , guide, return- And more ...For any comments or questions write us.DISCLAIMER This app is neither an official Toshiba product, nor are we affiliated with the Toshiba company.
descriptionHTML:
"Remote for Toshiba TV" is a virtual remote control that lets you control your TV. The application is completely free.

The application works on all Toshiba TVs. We use the infrared system of your smartphone so the detection of your TV will work automatically.

In addition to a beautiful design of the remote control, you can use all the functionality of the real remote.

Here is the list of features :
- Increase / decrease the volume
- Changing Channels
- Use the navigation pad
- Use the media player functions
- Smart TV function , info , guide, return
- And more ...

For any comments or questions write us.

DISCLAIMER
This app is neither an official Toshiba product, nor are we affiliated with the Toshiba company.
comments: Installed it cause my toshiba remote broke. Beside the full page add when u run the app it worked fine on my old lcd tv

Works really well with my Toshiba. Lots of ads. And took forever to find the right remote setting for my TV.. and the buttons are pretty small... hard to turn the volume up without accidentally turning my TV off....
Stuck scanning. Gave up after 25 min.
Works perfectly on my old flat screen toshiba, no scanning , good app
worked perfectly with my tv, didn't need to search or punch in codes. thanks.
worked soon as it was downloaded.
